nodes.text: The Typhonic Nebula was said to be the birthplace of Hylemane Lightbringer, a regent of the Galactic Republic who claimed that by being born from the nebula's dust, he could not be killed by mortal weapons.
In 35 ABY, Poe Dameron briefly skipped the Millennium Falcon into the nebula's Megafauna Chasm while evading First Order TIE/wi Interceptors.
